# Legacy Command Patterns to Audit (AC9)
#
# These patterns represent legacy cargo commands without explicit feature flags.
# All instances should be replaced with feature-aware versions.
#
# Search pattern: cargo build|test|run without --no-default-features

# Legacy build commands
cargo build
cargo build --release
cargo build --all-targets

# Legacy test commands
cargo test
cargo test --workspace
cargo test --all-targets

# Legacy run commands
cargo run
cargo run --release
cargo run -p bitnet-cli

# Legacy bench commands
cargo bench
cargo bench --all-targets

# Exceptions (OK to use without feature flags):
# - cargo fmt
# - cargo clippy (when using --all-features)
# - cargo doc
# - cargo clean
# - cargo update

# Replacement Pattern:
# OLD: cargo build
# NEW: cargo build --no-default-features --features cpu

# OLD: cargo test --workspace
# NEW: cargo test --workspace --no-default-features --features cpu

# OLD: cargo run -p bitnet-cli
# NEW: cargo run -p bitnet-cli --no-default-features --features cpu,full-cli
